note:
“Nothing is built on stone; all is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone.”
-Jorge Luis Borges

For now I must remain anonymous on this account, as my work necessitates a more neutral public persona on my real name account, with less sharing of things there that align with my own views. This account provides that outlet for me, and also is where I come for the majority of my news stories thanks to the many journalists who are moving here. Thanks for understanding.
